Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete Rhinos Training App

- React + TypeScript + Material UI application
- Complete authentication with role system (Player/Coach)
- Training management with coach plans and free sessions
- Workout logging with set-by-set tracking
- Attendance system with check-in functionality
- Leaderboard with rankings and filtering
- Notification system with bell and hard notifications
- Profile page with metrics and projections
- Admin panel for coaches with:
  - Exercise catalog management (60+ exercises with YouTube videos)
  - Team sessions management with date scheduling
  - Training types management (Strength, Speed, CB Drills, etc.)
  - Policies configuration (free sessions, compliance rules)
- Full i18n support (English/German)
- Mobile-responsive design
- Info tooltips explaining exercise types
